MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract bool OnMove (int offset);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnMove(int32 offset) cil managed

Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to seek to a relative offset.
Docs.returns: Returns true if seeking is supported and the seek was successful, otherwise false.
Docs.remarks: If an attempt is made to move to a position outside the stream, the position must be set to the closest point within the stream (beginning or end).

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract IntPtr OnPeek (IntPtr buffer, IntPtr size);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance native int OnPeek(native int buffer, native int size) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of bytes to read.
Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to copy the specified number of bytes into the specified buffer.
Docs.returns: Returns the number of bytes actually peeked/copied.
Docs.remarks: The stream’s cursor must be returned to the position before this method was called.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract IntPtr OnRead (IntPtr buffer, IntPtr size);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance native int OnRead(native int buffer, native int size) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of bytes to read.
Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to copy the specified number of bytes into the specified buffer.
Docs.returns: Returns the number of bytes actually read.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract bool OnRewind ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnRewind() cil managed

Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to rewind the current stream.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the stream is known to be at the beginning after this call returns.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract bool OnSeek (IntPtr position);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnSeek(native int position) cil managed

Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to seek to an absolute position.
Docs.returns: Returns true if seeking is supported and the seek was successful, otherwise false.
Docs.remarks: If an attempt is made to move to a position outside the stream, the position must be set to the closest point within the stream (beginning or end).
